snippet.desc: Loops the selected background music.
snippet.description: Loops the selected background music.
snippet.name: Background Music

snippet.desc: Gives the actor the notion of ammunition.
snippet.description: Gives the actor the notion of ammunition.
snippet.name: Ammo

boolean.desc: Has infinite ammunition and doesn't decrease on each use.
boolean.name: infinite

text.desc: Message that will cause this actor to attempt to use ammo.
text.name: useAmmo

text.desc: Message that will replenish this actor's ammo stores to their maximum.
text.name: reload

text.desc: The message that is sent when the actor can use ammo (e.g. fire a bullet). If using with another snippet like Spawn Actor, make this matches the 'Triggering Message' field.
text.name: usedAmmo

text.desc: Message to send when this actor uses its last ammo.
text.name: ammoDepleted

snippet.desc: Spawns an object at a specific velocity that depends on the position of the mouse on screen. Magnitude of the velocity is capped.
snippet.description: Spawns an object at a specific velocity that depends on the position of the mouse on screen. Magnitude of the velocity is capped.
snippet.name: Fire Cannon

actortype.desc: The kind of Actor to create.
actortype.name: type

number.desc: The maximum magnitude of the bullet's velocity (otherwise it'll be boundless power and would render the game pointless!)
number.name: maxPower

snippet.desc:
Fades out the actor and kills it after a specified time.
You can also set the fade time to zero and have no fade.
snippet.description:
Fades out the actor and kills it after a specified time.
You can also set the fade time to zero and have no fade.
snippet.name: Fade Out and Die after Time

number.desc:
The time in seconds it takes for the actor to begin fading out.

Default: 1
number.name: _StartFadingAfter

number.desc:
The amount of time in seconds it takes the actor to fade all the way out and die.

Default: 3
number.name: _FadeTime

snippet.desc: Plays a sound when it hears "healthDepleted"
snippet.description: Plays a sound when it hears "healthDepleted"
snippet.name: Play Sound on Depleted Health

sound.desc: What sound should play when this hears "healthDepleted"?
sound.name: _SoundtoPlay

snippet.desc: Gives actor the notion of Health.
snippet.description: Gives actor the notion of Health.
snippet.name: Health

number.desc: Decrements by this amount if the colliding actor did not specify a damage amount.
number.name: defaultDmg

number.desc: Starting amount of health. Can't exceed max health.
number.name: initHealth

actor.desc: Don't let the same actor cause multiple damages to happen.
actor.name: actorCache

snippet.desc: Spawns the Actor Type of your choice when this Actor dies. You can specify the X & Y offset relative to the main Actor, as well as the lifetime of the spawned actor before it dies. Useful for death animations.
snippet.description: Spawns the Actor Type of your choice when this Actor dies. You can specify the X & Y offset relative to the main Actor, as well as the lifetime of the spawned actor before it dies. Useful for death animations.
snippet.name: Spawn Actor upon Death

number.desc: Horizontal offset from the original actor
number.name: xOffset

number.desc: Vertical offset from the original actor
number.name: yOffset

number.desc: How long should the actor stay alive before disappearing?
number.name: lifespan

snippet.desc: Makes an actor die when its health is depleted. Use in conjunction with Health.
snippet.description: Makes an actor die when its health is depleted. Use in conjunction with Health.
snippet.name: Die on Depleted Health

snippet.desc: Actor Specific Events
snippet.description: Actor Specific Events
snippet.name: ActorEvents_4

snippet.desc: Kills the actor when it collides with something else.
snippet.description: Kills the actor when it collides with something else.
snippet.name: Die on Collision

snippet.desc: Actor Specific Events
snippet.description: Actor Specific Events
snippet.name: ActorEvents_2

snippet.desc: Hides the default mouse cursor. Also gives you to ability to show it again.
snippet.description: Hides the default mouse cursor. Also gives you to ability to show it again.
snippet.name: Hide Mouse Cursor

boolean.desc: Check this if you want to unhide the mouse cursor. If this is unchecked, it will hide the mouse cursor.
boolean.name: _ShowMouseCursor

snippet.desc: Allows this actor to damage another actor through a collision.
snippet.description: Allows this actor to damage another actor through a collision.
snippet.name: Inflicts Damage

snippet.desc: Scene Specific Events
snippet.description: Scene Specific Events
snippet.name: SceneEvents_0

snippet.desc: Actor Specific Events
snippet.description: Actor Specific Events
snippet.name: ActorEvents_15

snippet.desc:
Makes the actor face in the direction of the mouse.

Specify an initial direction (in degrees) if the actor's animation is not initially facing up.
snippet.description:
Makes the actor face in the direction of the mouse.

Specify an initial direction (in degrees) if the actor's animation is not initially facing up.
snippet.name: Face Mouse

number.desc: Angle of the graphic being used. "North" is 90 degrees. "East" is 0 degrees.
number.name: initAngle

snippet.desc: Actor Specific Events
snippet.description: Actor Specific Events
snippet.name: ActorEvents_25

snippet.desc: Perform specified action when the mouse is clicked.
snippet.description: Perform specified action when the mouse is clicked.
snippet.name: Do on Mouse Click

text.desc: The message to send upon clicking the mouse.
text.name: msg

snippet.desc: Anchor the actor's center to the position of the mouse.
snippet.description: Anchor the actor's center to the position of the mouse.
snippet.name: Follow Mouse

snippet.desc: Reloads scene.
snippet.description: Reloads scene.
snippet.name: Reset Game

snippet.desc: Acts like a basic button - does specified action when pressed. Check "one time" to make the button act only once.
snippet.description: Acts like a basic button - does specified action when pressed. Check "one time" to make the button act only once.
snippet.name: Simple Button

text.desc: The message to send upon pressing this button.
text.name: action

boolean.desc: Select this if the action is meant to be performed just once.
boolean.name: justOnce
